entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries along the foothills early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 February 2023
